name: Mars Auto
headline: Autonomous trucks for warehouse-to-warehouse shipping
description: Mars Auto is building autonomous trucks to completely automate warehouse-to-warehouse truck operations.

## Mars Auto is building autonomous trucks to fully automate long-haul truck operations
![Work 1](https://marsauto.com/static/media/img_16.903ecd5f3dabf16d866d.webp)![Work 2](https://marsauto.com/static/media/img_15.71dc5ae23972b87c49d0.webp)![Work 3](https://marsauto.com/static/media/img_20.a7addc201514c7bcc020.webp)![Work 4](https://marsauto.com/static/media/img_17.9895f9c95c1762a57455.webp)![Work 5](https://marsauto.com/static/media/img_19.e39c44527df64d5c3ce4.webp)![Work 6](https://marsauto.com/static/media/img_21.6b0548c590c1813b5c1f.webp)
## Building something different
Autonomous technology will be applied to the trucking industry before anywhere else. Mars Auto is in a unique position to be one of the first companies to deploy driverless trucks on the road. Our data-driven approach allows us to learn driving policy from actual driving data, and our system can be deployed at a fraction of the cost of other solutions.
We are paving the road towards driverless trucks, and hold many industry-first records. Mars Auto started the first autonomous freight shipping in Korea in 2020. Since 2023, we have been the first-ever and the only 'commercial' long-haul autonomous freight shipper in Korea. And in 2024, with 1,000,000km of autonomous mileage - the largest in Korea under our belt, we're expanding our fleet to the vast American market as well.
![](https://marsauto.com/static/media/driving.6aa4cfb0a00ea93830a5.gif)
## The driver that keeps on improving
We ditch the traditional method of using HD maps and hand-coded heuristics, and adopt a data-driven approach to solve autonomous trucks. Relying on HD maps to drive will never be enough to deploy unmanned vehicles on the road. Our data-driven approach has enabled our trucks to drive robustly in unforseen situations across different environments. With more data collected every day, our driving model keeps getting better and better.
[LEARN MORE ABOUT OUR TECH](https://marsauto.com/</technology>)
## Autonomous vehicle technology tailored for the trucking industry
Our focus on warehouse to warehouse operations has enabled us to deploy autonomous trucks faster than anyone else in the industry. Mars Auto trucks drive more fuel efficiently than the average driver, leading to decreased operation costs for carriers and more reliable and safe driving for drivers.
![](https://marsauto.com/static/media/truck2.d83dcca99fb3a1adbd3e.webp)
[VIEW OPEN POSITIONS IN MARS AUTO](https://marsauto.com/</careers>)
## Investors
Mars Auto is backed by top investors from around the world.
![Mirae Asset](https://marsauto.com/static/media/mirae.3e27bbdba3ca9c785662.webp)![YC](https://marsauto.com/static/media/yc.614d35d42017b5eeab75.webp)![GFT Ventures](https://marsauto.com/static/media/gft.c84a076309d4dec79b5f.webp)![KV](https://marsauto.com/static/media/kakao.fb9117a9e044a819f889.webp)

generated_description:
**Mars Auto: Pioneering Autonomous Trucking Solutions**

Founded in 2017 and part of Y Combinator’s Batch W19, Mars Auto is redefining the logistics landscape through the development of autonomous trucks specifically designed for warehouse-to-warehouse shipping. Based in South Korea and supported by a small yet dedicated team of 15 employees, the company has set ambitious goals in the realm of driverless transport. The essence of Mars Auto’s mission is straightforward: to completely automate long-haul truck operations.

**Innovative Approach and Milestones**

What sets Mars Auto apart in the crowded field of autonomous technologies is its data-driven methodology. Instead of relying on traditional HD maps and pre-programmed instructions, they harness driving data to continuously refine their learning algorithms. This adaptive strategy allows their trucks to navigate unexpected situations in diverse environments, enhancing both safety and reliability. 

Since launching the first-ever autonomous freight service in Korea in 2020, Mars Auto has built significant momentum. They achieved a milestone in 2023 as the first commercial long-haul autonomous freight shipper in the country. As of 2024, they've amassed an impressive 1,000,000 km of autonomous driving mileage, making them the leading player in Korea and positioning them for expansion into the American market.

**Efficient and Cost-Effective Solutions**

Their trucks reportedly operate more fuel-efficiently than the average driver, translating into reduced operational costs for logistics providers. This efficiency not only supports the bottom line but also promises a safer driving experience.

As Mars Auto looks to the future, their focus remains laser-focused on refining their technology and scaling their fleet to meet the growing demand for autonomous logistics. The potential for growth is enormous, especially as they transition into broader markets.

**Connect and Collaborate**

For anyone interested in learning more or seeking opportunities in autonomous logistics, Mars Auto actively invites communication. Their growth story is backed by prominent investors from around the globe, including Mirae Asset, Y Combinator, GFT Ventures, and Kakao, which reflects confidence in their trajectory.

To explore further, check out their [website](https://marsauto.com) and engage with their journey in transforming how goods move in the future.

In summary, Mars Auto is not just building trucks—they're engineering the future of transportation. With a unique approach and powerful vision, they’re not just keeping pace with innovation, they’re leading the charge.
